description.narrative: This activity (Output 1: Technical Assistance) is a component of Responding to Protracted Crisis in Sudan: Humanitarian Reform, Assistance & Resilience Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £860,246. This component benefits Sudan, and works in the following sector(s): Relief co-ordination and support services. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 28-03-2019 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
